patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -978,5 +978,32 @@
 
 
 
 
+}
+
+.hovercards {
+    display: flex;
+    align-items: flex-end; /*      */
+}
+
+.hovercard {
+    width: 100px; /*  ,    */
+    height: 200px; /*  ,    */
+    position: relative; /*      */
+    overflow: hidden; /*    */
+}
+
+.hovercard__content {
+    position: absolute; /*     */
+    bottom: 0; /*      */
+    writing-mode: vertical-rl; /*     */
+    transform: rotate(180deg); /*  ,      */
+    display: flex; /*   flex   */
+    align-items: flex-start; /*      */
+}
+
+.textwrap {
+    display: flex; /*    */
+    justify-content: center; /*     */
+    height: 100%; /*    */
 }
\ No newline at end of file
